subtitle: A traditional Northumbrian potato dish.

method.text: Melt butter in a frying pan. Add onions and fry for 2-3 min until softened.
In a large, lightly greased, ovenproof dish, layer the potatoes, fried onions, cheese and seasoning, finishing with a layer of cheese.
Cook in oven for 40-45 min, until potatoes are tender and cheese is golden brown. Serve immediately.
